html:
Industry Research

A dissertation is required for students to apply the competencies acquired in research methodologies, and initiate students to the field of research. This dissertation prepares students to formulate research questions and explore the field with in-depth reading to develop the studies. While preparing students who would consider post graduate studies, the problematic studied are directly connected to real industry situation and unresolved challenges.

Learning Objectives for this module:

+  Identifying a topic and relevant problematic.

+  Carry out literature review.

+  Design research methodology.

+  Describe and analyse findings to answer research questions.

+  Applying and operationalizing the new knowledge to a given situation which caters for the industry needs and request as per the professional requirement.

Module Content:
